mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getQnAList */ SELECT a.id 'id' ,a.customer_mobile 'customerMobile' ,a.customer_email 'customerEmail' ,a.customer_question 'customerQuestion' ,a.qna_status 'qnaStatus' ,a.modify_datetime 'modifyDatetime' ,a.create_datetime 'createDatetime' ,a.creator 'creator' FROM cmm_qna a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.id = #{id} AND UPPER(a.customer_mobile) = UPPER(#{customerMobile}) AND UPPER(a.customer_email) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{customerEmail}), '%') AND UPPER(a.customer_question) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{customerQuestion}), '%') AND UPPER(a.qna_status) = UPPER(#{qnaStatus}) AND a.creator = #{creator} AND str_to_date(#{searchDateFrom}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{searchDateTo}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(a.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getTotalCntForQnAList */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cmm_qna a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.id = #{id} AND UPPER(a.customer_mobile) = UPPER(#{customerMobile}) AND UPPER(a.customer_email) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{customerEmail}), '%') AND UPPER(a.customer_question) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{customerQuestion}), '%') AND UPPER(a.qna_status) = UPPER(#{qnaStatus}) AND a.creator = #{creator} AND str_to_date(#{searchDateFrom}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{searchDateTo}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(a.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.delete: /* QUERY ID : deleteQnA */ DELETE FROM cmm_qna WHERE id = #{id}
